sections.title: Welcome to Dataland
text: This is the main introduction of our homepage.

cards.text: Search for a company to view or request data...

cards.title: XXX XXX,
cards.date: "Dataland is the bridge that connects us to data independency and unlimited possibilities."

cards.title: Data Gaps
cards.text: Valuable insights remain hidden, preventing businesses from harnessing the full potential of their data.

cards.title: Data Quality
cards.text: Inaccurate, inconsistent, or outdated data jeopardizes the integrity of analytics and decision processes, leading to misguided strategies.

cards.title: Data Usage Rights
cards.text: Companies must ensure they have the legal permissions to collect, store, process, and share data while adhering to regulations and privacy laws.

cards.title: Data Usage
cards.text: Many organizations struggle with underutilization. Data analysis tools might be intimidating or inaccessible to certain teams, limiting the ability to extract valuable insights.

cards.title: Search
cards.text: Utilize the search feature to find specific companies within the platform.

cards.title: Request companyâ€™s inclusion
cards.text: Request companyâ€™s inclusion in case you canâ€™t find the company you are looking for.

cards.title: Request framework data
cards.text: Create or join a campaign to get the missing data.

cards.title: Download
cards.text: Download either through the platform or through API.

sections.title: Join a campaign
text: The Proof of Concepts are a simple way for you to get better data coverage and improved data quality, while testing Dataland.

cards.title: Pathways to Paris
cards.text: Captures companiesâ€™ progress on Paris-compatible transformation paths that are necessary to achieve the goals of the Paris climate protection agreement.

cards.title: LkSG
cards.text: The Lieferkettensorgfalts-pflichtengesetz is a German law requiring companies to monitor human rights and environmental risks in their supply chains.

cards.title: EU Taxonomy
cards.text: The EU Taxonomy Regulation supports companies to capture their environmentally sustainable economic activities.

cards.title: SFDR
cards.text: SFDR helps investors to properly assess how sustainability risks are integrated in the investment decision process.

cards.title: Your message
cards.date: By clicking Get in Touch,  you agree to our Terms of use and that you have read our Privacy Policy.
